page.title: 15FEARS FOR THE FUTURE
page.content: Village people would like the present situation to continue.They like Nanstallon as it is,but fear further building will come and Bodmin will spread to engulf it.Most express fear of anything nuclear,war,waste, accident.Worry is caused by the long term effect of pollution of air and sea.This with large scale clearance of forests could dangerously affect the climate.The Earth's resources are being carelessly wasted.Population growth threatens land and facilities. People are afraid of violence and terrorism.Some do not like opening their doors at night.Young people fear computers will mean more unemployment, parents worry about drugs and promiscuity,old folk loneliness and loss of mobility.Few seem to worry about money,but cancer is still a bogey.
